questions.question_text: Explain the process of converting a number from binary to decimal. Provide an example.
questions.sample_answer: To convert binary to decimal, multiply each digit by powers of 2 from right to left. Example: 101₂ = (1×2²) + (0×2¹) + (1×2⁰) = 4 + 0 + 1 = 5₁₀

questions.subject: Physics
questions.question_text: Define acceleration and state its SI unit. Give an example of uniform acceleration.
questions.sample_answer: Acceleration is the rate of change of velocity. SI unit: m/s². Example: A car starting from rest and reaching 20 m/s in 5 seconds has uniform acceleration of 4 m/s².

questions.explanation: The SI unit is fundamental to understanding Static Electricity.
